Description: Fragment of flattened handle of a pottery transport amphora to moderate turn. Clay near fine buff-brown. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 27a, 1. It is tempting to see here the ethnic 'Mendaios', but the clay does not contain mica, even if otherwise it is consistent with an origin from Mende.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1720)
